name: Sub Liminal
description:
Hello! Sub Liminal is a casual score-chase horizontal scroller with a vibe.

I challenged myself to build a game from scratch in a week, and I did it! All assets (minus the fonts used for score tracking) were created by me.

The game was made in Godot <3

See if you can get all the broadcasts and get a crazy high score!
Thank you so much for checking it out!
